items.name: chat-input-1
items.title: Chat Input 1
items.description: A bordered, white chat input with header, subheader, textarea, and model selection dropdown.

items.name: chat-input-2
items.title: Chat Input 2
items.description: A modern, dark-themed chat input bar inspired by AI chat UIs. Includes model selection, image upload, action icons, and chat privacy indicator.

items.name: chat-input-3
items.title: Chat Input 3
items.description: A soft, gradient chat input bar inspired by modern AI chat UIs. Includes model selection, globe, search, attachment icons, and a floating send button.

items.name: chat-input-4
items.title: Chat Input 4
items.description: A minimal, dark chat input bar with attachment and send buttons.

items.name: chat-input
items.title: Chat Input (Base)
items.description: A sticky, bordered, white chat input with textarea, model selection, and action buttons. Responsive and accessible, following shadcn/ui patterns.

items.name: voice-toolbar-1
items.title: Voice Toolbar 1
items.description: A toolbar with pill-shaped buttons for voice features and a description box. Includes icons for Text to Speech, Voice Changer, Dubbing, Text to SFX, and Voice Cloning.
